casebody.data:
FORHEALTH TECHNOLOGIES, INC., also known as FHT, Inc., Appellant, v. INTELLIGENT HOSPITAL SYSTEMS LTD., Appellee. No. 2014-1348. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Nov. 10, 2014. *888David Leason, Leason Ellis LLP, White Plains, New York, argued for appellant. Kevin B. Laurence, Oblon, Spivak, McClelland, Maier & Neustadt, L.L.P., Alexandria, Virginia, argued for appellee. With him on the brief was Greg H. Gardella.

PROST, Chief Judge, NEWMAN and TARANTO, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This Cause having been heard and considered, it is

Ordered and Adjudged:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
